job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongThe Company strongppbrppOur client is a digital drug discovery company whose mission is to develop leading Machine Learning technology to serve customers and corporate partners in the healthcare life sciences biopharmaceutical diagnostics and precision medicine industriesppbrppThe team which has grown steadily since its founding in 2016 is distributed and based around New York Boston and Toronto The ML platform has been engineered to provide solutions and services focused on the largescale predictive analytics of complex biomedical data across preclinical discoveryppbrppstrongThe Role strongppbrppAs a Data Scientist focusing on imaging you will work alongside expert Data Scientists to expand the image processing capabilities for the in vivo phenotyping platform based on embryonic zebrafish You will also contribute to Data Science projects in genomics clinical outcomes analysis and chemoinformatics Specifically you will ppnbsppulliExpand the Pythonbased image and video processing framework using quantitative analysis and computer vision techniques to identify specific characteristics in embryonic zebrafishliliWork with the Data Science team and the VP of Research to expand the capabilities of the ML framework and address needs that arise for client projects across preclinical drug discoveryliliActively participate in feedback sessions to help guide the development of the ML platformliulpbrppbrppstrongYou need strongppbrpulliExpert knowledge of image processing PhD degree preferredliliKnowledge of tools concepts and methodologies of analytics and machine learningliliSkilled in the use of PythonliliExperience in dealing with high dimensional data eg data fusion feature transformation feature selectionliul
